name: QR scanner. No Ads and Free!
description: Safe reading of QR codes with protection from malicious links to fake and dangerous sites. Find scanned QR code and the barcode immediately on the map! Scan history. Export and share data with built-in Google Docs export.   Stay safe - check links for malicious content!  QR scanner and barcode scanner with geotags - a new application in which you see scanned codes on the map immediately! QR code reader quickly recognizes most QR formats and barcodes. It will check the URL on phishing and warn you if dangerous link direct to a malicious website .  Download Geotag QR scanner/ barcode scanner for Android - now completely free!  Basic functions: Keep the history of all objects processed by the QR reader.  Automatic safe link checking.  The scanner will warn if the link direct you to malware and phishing traps.  Find each saved QR code and barcode on the map. Share and export your scan data with Google Sheet.  Use the built-in QR scanner backlight for scanning in the dark. Connect to a Wi-Fi network using QR code. Get a beep and vibration when QR code scanner with geotags successfully recognizes QR code or barcode Enjoy a very simple and pleasant design! :)  The QR code scanner / barcode scanner recognizes:   BITCOIN - address and amount. V-CARD - name, address, email, work phone, address book. MECARD - personal address book. PRODUCT - products Page URI - housing receipts URL - links to web pages. TEXT - any text. EMAIL - address, subject and message. PHONE - phone number. SMS - phone number and message text. LOCATION - address and geographical coordinates. FACEBOOK - And other social networks EVENT - event, address and time. WIFI - network name, password, encryption. And many other formats EAN, ISBN, UPC, Data Matrix QR code ..   How to scan QR code or barcode on Android phones:   1) Open the QR scanner and point the phone / tablet so that it can focus on the qr code on the product or on the check. 2) The QR-code reader activates the recognition function, takes a picture and saves it in the code history. 3) For QR codes and barcodes with a URL, open the corresponding website.  Of course, this barcode reader also works with coupons and reads the qr code on the check. You can scan various products using our Geotag scanner, store codes and their locations. Online search can compare the cost of products on the Internet and in different stores.  Leave your feedback and help us improve Geotag QR-code and barcode reader!
